projects.name: Zap
projects.desc: Batman vs Superman! Captain America vs Ironman! With this simple microblog you can talk about your favorite superheroes with all of your comic book friends.

projects.name: Sule
projects.desc: Are you tired of how fast-paced the world is? Use this interactive capsule site, to save your memories and have a loved one open them upon a set date.

projects.name: Datamapper
projects.desc: A site for earth scientists to post the plots that their data are taken from and collaborate with other scientists. This implements the Google Maps API, JavaScript, and AJAX so each user's plot is saved immediately and dynamically.

projects.name: Ask Dr. Apa
projects.desc: A blog for Dr. Michael Apa; who travels the world helping people find their brightest smiles. I built the entire website from scratch using webframes provided by a graphic designer.

projects.name: Chalogy Beauty
projects.desc: A new makeup and beauty line from Chalogy in South Korea. My main focuses were implementing the shopping cart functionality, creating the Saturday Skin brand and ingredients pages and the About and Innovation pages.

projects.name: Design+Shop
projects.desc: The shop for CMYK+White. I mostly maintain and update the site, adding in new pages and features as requested.

projects.name: Flirt
projects.desc: Landing pages for the new Flirt Flashes campaign by Estée Lauder. I built the sites from scratch for a mobile-only audience following designs provided to me.

projects.name: Now New York
projects.desc: The website and corresponding Chrome extension, built and designed completely from scratch with my coworker. My main focuses were the weather, to-do, links, news, and settings modules. Both the website and the extension use the same languages.

projects.name: Platey
projects.desc: A simple weight calculator for figuring out which plates to put on a barbell at the gym. Built and designed by myself.
